title: High Growth Tech Stocks in Asia with Promising Potential
description: As global markets respond to shifting monetary policies and economic indicators, the Asian tech sector has been capturing attention with its dynamic growth potential, particularly in light of recent gains in Chinese stock markets. In this environment, identifying promising tech stocks involves looking for companies that can effectively navigate these evolving conditions while leveraging innovation to drive sustainable growth.
content:
As global markets respond to shifting monetary policies and economic indicators, the Asian tech sector has been capturing attention with its dynamic growth potential, particularly in light of recent gains in Chinese stock markets. In this environment, identifying promising tech stocks involves looking for companies that can effectively navigate these evolving conditions while leveraging innovation to drive sustainable growth. Click here to see the full list of 176 stocks from our Asian High Growth Tech and AI Stocks screener. Underneath we present a selection of stocks filtered out by our screen. Overview: HYBE Co., Ltd. operates in music production, publishing, and artist development and management, with a market cap of ₩11.89 billion. Operations: HYBE generates revenue primarily through music production, publishing, and artist management. The company's operations are supported by a market cap of approximately ₩11.89 billion. HYBE, a player in the dynamic entertainment sector, reported robust second-quarter earnings with sales rising to KRW 705.65 billion from KRW 640.46 billion year-over-year, and net income increasing to KRW 18.06 billion from KRW 14.59 billion. Despite a challenging past year with earnings growth dipping by 28%, the company is on a recovery path, underscored by an impressive forecast of annual earnings growth at 46.3%. This performance is particularly notable in an industry where HYBE's revenue growth of 16.8% annually outpaces the Korean market average of 7.2%. However, profitability remains under pressure with current profit margins at a modest 2.3%, down from last year's 3.6%. As HYBE continues to navigate its financial landscape, these figures highlight both its resilience and areas needing strategic focus amidst fluctuating market conditions.
• Click here and access our complete health analysis report to understand the dynamics of HYBE. KOSE:A352820 Revenue and Expenses Breakdown as at Aug 2025 Overview: Shenzhen Topband Co., Ltd. specializes in the research, development, production, and sale of intelligent control system solutions both domestically and internationally, with a market cap of CN¥19.30 billion.
summary: The Asian tech sector has been receiving attention due to its potential for growth, particularly in light of recent gains in Chinese stock markets. The list includes a list of 176 stocks from our Asian High Growth Tech and AI Stocks screener. The company, HYBE Co., Ltd., operates in music production, publishing, and artist development and management, with a market cap of approximately ₩11.89 billion. Despite a challenging past year, the company is on a recovery path with a forecast of annual earnings growth at 46.3%. However, profitability remains under pressure, with current profit margins at a modest 2.3%, down from last year's 3.6%.
shortSummary: The Asian High Growth Tech and AI Stocks screener showcases promising tech stocks with promising growth potential, but challenges remain in their current financial landscape.

About the Company
| Founded | Employees | CEO | Website |
|---|---|---|---|
| 1997 | n/a | n/a | www.nanyapcb.com.tw |
Nan Ya Printed Circuit Board Corporation manufactures and sells printed circuit boards (PCBs) in Taiwan, the United States, Mainland China, Korea, and internationally. It offers conventional PCBs that are used in the motherboards of desktops and notebooks, and home electrical appliances; high density connector boards that are used in smartphones, game consoles, navigation systems, PDAs, automobile appliances, and MP3 players; and soft and hard composite boards used in high-end handheld devices and notebook computers. The company also provides flip chip substrates comprising pin/land grid arrays for microprocessors; and ball grid arrays for graphic chips, northbridge chipsets, high-end ASIC chipsets, and digital TV chipsets.

Shenzhen Topband Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the research and development, production, and sale of intelligent control system solutions in China and internationally. It operates through Tools, Home Appliance, New Energy, and Industrial segments. The company provides diversified, customized solutions for home appliances, tools, industry, new energy, intelligent solutions, etc. It also offers product concepts, design, development, manufacturing, and delivery services for the home appliances industry, comprising master and power control, motor drive and control, and display control for applications in HVAC, kitchen appliances, cleaning appliances, health care, lighting, and smart homes; and the tools industry, such as controllers, motors, batteries and power supplies, and intelligent products.

HYBE Co., Ltd. engages in the music production, publishing, and artist development and management businesses. It is also involved in the video content, IP, games, e-commerce, management agency, education, application software development and supply, goods dealership, system software development, and content activities. The company was formerly known as Big Hit Entertainment Co., Ltd.
